title: The Genesis of a dissident
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Soviet Government and Politics”.
One of a series of films which make up a third level course from the Faculty of Social Science Open University. Offers an introduction to contemporary Soviet politics whilst simultaneously relating political practice to the historical development of the Soviet State and Marxist political theory. Presented by Victor Fainberg.
